note.p: Tailor. Born in Martinique, West Indies, or Plymouth, Devon. Tailor in London from at least 1851 to 1871. Shirt maker and bookkeeper, 1871. Clerk, 1881.
Census returns of England and Wales 1851 (The National Archive: Public Record Office HO 107/1488/215/24), 1861 (RG9/182/53/14), 1871 (RG10/674/96/26), 1881 (RG11/141/14/21)
Correspondence vol. 10, letter from G. E. Harris, 3 March 1862
England & Wales national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations) 1858–1966 (Ancestry.com, accessed 22 February 2016)
